channel.title: Questions =\
channel.description:
K I got a few questions =P
[b]Dedicated server...How would I get one? Where,how,etc.[/b]
[s]Timers. I tryed correcting my weapon timers but they stay the same, how would I change this?[/s]
[s]Restarter, I have the voule auto-restarter but..it doesn't close the other runserver? Anyothers?[/s]
[s]Anti-lag. Is there some anti-lag I can add to my server, Currently got Xero's; Think that's it.[/s]
Help would be like awesome to the highest degree ( <--- Just kidding, but not really.)

item.title: Questions =\
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Gracias.

google.com has no help what so ever for dedicated servers. Just comes up with some websites for voting; top 100 etc.

Really, how did Zdiddy/NGW (New Gamers World) Get dedicated servers?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions =\
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

  1. www.google.com
  2. In client.java, process is called every 500ms or so, depending on the computer. You can set up a timer in there. I wouldn’t trust all the current attack timers as in my experience it doesn’t work well.
  3. rune-server.org; search for Anime’s auto restarter. Works good imo.
  4. With the current servers, having an “anti-lag” is totally useless. It doesn’t do anything.

Read full topic
